content: **quick & easy knit for an adorable baby hat** **a fun project for a baby gift & excellent for charity knitting** *pattern is completely free & available with no ads from my all-about-knitting website* **yarn** ~ 25g 50yds of any heavy dk or light worsted yarn yes sock yarn held double works too **needles** us 3 & us 5 either long circular for magicloop or dpns info in the pattern for how i like to knit mine but do what makes you happy **pattern is written for newborn size with notes for fitting preemies** ***nothing fancy here just a quick and simple pattern for a fun modern take on a baby hat beginners welcome & i m always available for help along the way if needed ***
